Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Barinade#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Eyedrops#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Small Key#.
